explains: abbr. 大老党（美国共和党的别称）（Grand Old Party）；地面观测站（Ground Observation Post）

sentences.en: But will the GOP take full advantage?
sentences.cn: 但是共和党会充分发挥优势吗？

sentences.en: Now have you been watching the GOP debates?
sentences.cn: 那个，您看了共和党候选人辩论了吗？

sentences.en: On this matter, don't expect the GOP to budge much.
sentences.cn: 此问题上，不要指望大老党能有一点让步。
